title: Textile, ca. 1730
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 7&1 satin with continuous (green and yellow) and discontinuous (2 reds, yellow and textured blue) supplementary wefts. The continuous wefts are bound into the structure in twill binding; the discontinuous wefts float on the back.
dimensions:
Warp: 182cm (72in.). Weft (2 s/s peices sewn together):110cm (43 1/4in.)
Pattern: Height: 62.5cm (24 3/4in.). Width of minimum weaving unit: 28cm (11in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Josephine Howell
description: Vertically symmetrical design of elaborate plant forms with detailed fillings. Soft shades of ivory, green, yellow, blue, pink. orange and tan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1730.
ca. 1730. Medium: silk
Technique: 7&1 satin with continuous (green and yellow) and discontinuous (2 reds, yellow and textured blue) supplementary wefts. The continuous wefts are bound into the structure in twill binding; the discontinuous wefts float on the back.. Gift of the Estate of Josephine Howell. 1987-85-2.
